LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnGear.Temperature.Label: Show temperature information in the pawn gear command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnGear.Temperature.Tooltip: Include a pawn's temperature tolerance range in the pawn gear command (!mypawngear). Enabling this removes temperature information from !mypawnbody.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnGear.Apparel.Label: Show currently equipped apparel in the pawn gear command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnGear.Apparel.Tooltip: Include a pawn's current apparel in the pawn gear command (!mypawngear).
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnGear.Armor.Label: Show armor values in the pawn gear command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnGear.Armor.Tooltip: Include armor protection values in the pawn gear command (!mypawngear).
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnGear.Weapon.Label: Show currently equipped weapon in the pawn gear command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnGear.Weapon.Tooltip: Includes the weapon a pawn is currently equipped with in the pawn gear command (!mypawngear).
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnHealth.Surgeries.Label: Show queued surgeries in the pawn health command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnHealth.Surgeries.Tooltip: Includes currently queued surgeries in the pawn health command (!mypawnhealth).
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnWork.Sort.Label: Sort work priorities in the pawn work command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnWork.Sort.Tooltip: If enabled, work priorities will be sorted like the Work tab in the pawn work command (!mypawnwork). This means work will be displayed as the Work tab from left to right.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnWork.Filter.Label: Filter work priorities in the pawn work command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnWork.Filter.Tooltip: If enabled, disabled work priorities will be removed from the pawn work command's output (!mypawnwork). This means work priorities a pawn is incapable of doing, or is not assigned to, will be omitted from the command's response.
LanguageData.TKUtils.Abandon.Method: How pawns should leave when the leave command is invoked.
LanguageData.TKUtils.Abandon.Gear.Label: Colonists that leave by the leave command drop their inventory.
LanguageData.TKUtils.Abandon.Gear.Tooltip: If a viewer chooses to leave the colony by the leave command (!leave), they'll empty their inventory (including an worn items) before departing.
LanguageData.TKUtils.CoinRate.Label: Show a viewer's calculated coin rate in the balance command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.CoinRate.Tooltip: If enabled, Utils will include the amount of coins a viewer earns per interval in the balance command's output (!bal).
LanguageData.TKUtils.BuyItemBalance.Label: Show a viewer's remaining balance after buying an item.
LanguageData.TKUtils.BuyItemBalance.Tooltip: If enabled, Utils will include the viewer's remaining balance after purchasing an item.
LanguageData.TKUtils.CommandParser.Label: Use Utils' flavor of command handling.
LanguageData.TKUtils.CommandParser.Tooltip: Older users would remember this as its command parser.
LanguageData.TKUtils.CommandPrefix.Label: Command prefix
LanguageData.TKUtils.CommandPrefix.Tooltip:
The prefix to use for all Twitch Toolkit commands.
\Prefixes cannot start with a:
 - /
 - .
 - contain spaces
LanguageData.TKUtils.DecorateUtils.Label: Add a little star beside Utils in the mod list command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.VersionedModList.Label: Include mod versions in the mod list command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.VersionedModList.Tooltip: By default, the mod list command (!installedmods) only outputs mod names. This tweak allows you to include mod versions along side the names.
LanguageData.TKUtils.Emojis.Label: Use emojis in some commands.
LanguageData.TKUtils.Emojis.Tooltip: Allows Utils to use emoticons over text in some commands, like !mypawnhealth. If this is disabled, emoticons will be substituted with text.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnKind.Label: Allow viewers to specify their pawn's kind when buying.
LanguageData.TKUtils.PawnKind.Tooltip: If enabled, viewers will be able to specify their pawn's kind when buying a pawn (!buy pawn [race]).
LanguageData.TKUtils.LookupLimit.Label: Maximum number of results in the lookup command.
LanguageData.TKUtils.LookupLimit.Tooltip: The maximum number of results that will be displayed in the lookup command (!lookup). A higher value may create walls of text.
LanguageData.TKUtils.HairColor.Label: Dye viewer's hair color to match their chat color.
LanguageData.TKUtils.HairColor.Tooltip: If enabled, users will have their hair dyed to match their current chat color.
LanguageData.TKUtils.StoreRate.Label: The number of items the store will process per tick.
LanguageData.TKUtils.StoreRate.Tooltip: With a previous update, Utils made Toolkit's store immediately visible. Utils runs a background task to ensure the store is up-to-date with the latest items in the game. This setting changes how many items it will process per tick until complete.
LanguageData.TKUtils.DumpStyle.Label: Json dump style
LanguageData.TKUtils.DumpStyle.Tooltip: This setting changes how Utils dumps its shop data. If single file is selected, the default, the mod will write a single file containing its shop data. If multi-file is selected, Utils will write a single file for each category of data.
LanguageData.TKUtils.OffloadShop.Label: Offload saving shop data to a separate thread.
LanguageData.TKUtils.OffloadShop.Tooltip: If enabled, the mod will save shop data on a separate thread.\n\nWarning: This could lead to unexpected behavior.
